column1: #Text=Australia announces plans to close five mainland refugee detention centres

#Text=A spokesperson for the Australian Assistant Minister for Infrastructure and Regional Development , Warren Truss , announced plans this week to close four mainland immigration detention facilities — Scherger , at RAAF Scherger , Queensland ; Leonora , in Leonora , Western Australia ; Port Augusta , in Port Augusta , South Australia ; and Inverbrackie facilities in Woodside , the Adelaide Hills , South Australia — by the end of February .
#Text=The detainees would be relocated to other detention centres .
#Text=Pontville detention facility , in Pontville , Tasmania , was empty and would also be closed .
#Text=The detention centres staff learned about planned closure of their workplaces from the media rather than the employer directly , United Voice , an Australian trade union , commented .
#Text=It estimated the number of affected people as 100 workers and " many more " casuals and contractors .
#Text=In a statement , Australian Immigration Minister Scott Morrison referred to recent border protection practices to justify the decision .
